alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Middlesex; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:21AM EDT until July 14 at 6:45AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM EDT FOR MERCER...SOUTHWESTERN SOMERSET AND SOUTHWESTERN MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 620 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mercerville-Hamilton Square, or near Trenton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Ewing, Princeton, Hightstown, Pennington, Edinburg, White Horse, Windsor, Twin Rivers, Mercerville-Hamilton Square, Plainsboro Center, Lawrenceville, Princeton Meadows, Princeton Junction, Princeton North and Yardville-Groveville. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 8 and 8A. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 1 and 6. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 61 and 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
